          <title>
            <string language="fr">Goutte de pluie en tant que prisme</string>
            <string language="en">Raindrop as a prism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regentropfen als Prisma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pingo de chuva como um prisma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Raindrop come prisma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σταγόνα βροχής ως πρίσμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gota de agua como prisma</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre une goutte de pluie  agissant comme un prisme ce qui scinde la lumière blanche du soleil en couleurs de spectre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a raindrop acting like a prism which splits white sunlight into spectrum colours.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">se courbant</string>
            <string language="en">bending</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="fr">prisme</string>
            <string language="en">Prism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière du soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sunlight</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière  blanche</string>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Regentropfen, der wie
ein Prisma fungiert, welches weißes Tageslicht in Spektrumfarben 
aufspaltet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um pingo de chuva que 
age como um prisma qual racha a luz solar branca em cores do spectrum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un raindrop che si 
comporta come un prisma quale divide la luce solare bianca in colori 
di spettro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια σταγόνα βροχής 
ενεργώντας όπως ένα πρίσμα που χωρίζει το άσπρο φως του ήλιου 
στα χρώματα φάσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una gota de agua que 
actúa como un prisma cuál parte la luz del sol blanca en colores del
espectro.</string>
          </description>
